short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Extension every trader needs Benefits more for Zerodha's Kite Users)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manja is an extension I built for Kite out of love for Zerodha Products. This extension makes you a profession trader. Yes! but how? You can journal your daily trading activity on Manja using Trade Journal feature. You can delete all your disabled alerts in a single click. More crazy features on the line , to make you excite, let me share one of such, Next time when the PNL crosses x amount , Manja alerts you "Bro you better exit trades before margin call" . Just Kidding , You can customize the alerts message. Still looking for a reason to not install this one? We found one, which is you don't want to become a better trader.
